title: Heavy Love
lyrics:
Yeah (Co-co-co-co—)
Yeah, my codeine looking like Barney
This bitch acting way too preppy like Barbie
I-I-I like sleazy bitches ready to party
Rub that pussy on my stache like Steve Harvey

Got my hand on that wheel, whippin' down the highway
Please don't try give advice 'cause I did this my way-ay-ay
Clock into your job, the only time I see you Friday
And when you see your mom, just let her know how much you like me

Put your weight up on me, heavy love
(Ooh, ah, ooh, ah)
Put your weight up on me, heavy love
(Ooh, ah, ooh, ah)

You ain't got shit goin' on
You ain't gon' touch my shit at all
One, two, three, got 'em froze
They don't got five plaques on they walls
(Do it, do it, do it, do it)
(Do it, do it, do it, uh)
(Do it, do it, do it, do it)
(Do it, do it, do it, uh)
Snow angels
Snow angels

Put your weight up on me, heavy love
(Ooh, ah, ooh, ah)
Put your weight up on me, heavy love
(Ooh, ah, ooh, ah)
